oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Education Subcommittee Reports, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The final report called for the proposed consolidated government to adopt a public school system for metro Clarksville-Montgomery County. The report clarified the power and duties of the Board of Education. The subcommittee recommended that voters elect the Board of Education, and the Board of Education would appoint the Superintendent of Schools.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Education--Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
